branchCategory.name: JSY Plug-in
branchCategory.description: <p>Plug-in type for JSY series is available in 3 valve body sizes, JSY1000 (6.4mm), JSY3000 (10mm) and JSY5000 (15mm).  JSY plug-in type is compatible with fieldbus, ethernet and wireless communication module such as EX600 and EX260.</p>

branchItem.name: JSY Plug-in, Valve
branchItem.description: <p>Plug-in type for JSY series is available in 3 valve body sizes, JSY1000 (6.4mm), JSY3000 (10mm) and JSY5000 (15mm).  JSY plug-in type is compatible with fieldbus, ethernet and wireless communication module such as EX600 and EX260.</p>

branchItem.name: JSY Manifold, D-sub Connector, Flat Ribbon Connector Kit
branchItem.description: <p>Plug-in JSY manifold with D-sub and flat ribbon connector.  Up to 24 solenoids can be connected per manifold.</p>

branchItem.name: JSY Manifold, Terminal Block Kit
branchItem.description: <p>Plug-in JSY manifold with Terminal Block (Spring cage or screw type) Kit.  Up to 24 solenoids can be connected per manifold.</p>

branchItem.name: JSY Manifold, Lead Wire Kit
branchItem.description: <p>Plug-in JSY manifold with Lead Wire Kit.&nbsp; Up to 24 solenoids can be connected per manifold.</p>

branchItem.name: JSY Manifold, EX600 Kit
branchItem.description: <p>Plug-in JSY manifold with EX600 Communication Module Kit.&nbsp; Up to 32 solenoids can be connected per manifold.&nbsp; EX600 system allows modular construction with up to 9 Input/Output units per manifold.</p>

branchItem.name: JSY Manifold, EX260 Kit
branchItem.description: <p>Plug-in JSY manifold with EX260 Communication Module Kit.&nbsp; Up to 32 solenoids can be connected per manifold. EX260 series is a compact and cost-effective interface to connect valve manifolds to ethernet and fieldbus network.</p>

branchItem.name: JSY Manifold, EX250 Kit
branchItem.description: <p>Plug-in JSY manifold with EX250 Communication Module Kit.&nbsp; EX250 allows connection up to 32 solenoids along with 32 inputs per node</p>

branchItem.name: JSY Manifold, EX120 Kit
branchItem.description: <p>Plug-in JSY manifold with EX120 Communication Module Kit.&nbsp; EX120 allows connection up to 16 solenoids.</p>
